profile.profileDescription: A profile for a collection of born-digital and time based media artworks.

Introduction
label.description: Narrative description for set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the set.

label.name: Introduction
label.description: Narrative description for set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the set.

label.name: Introduction
label.description: Description narrative pour l'ensemble. Il s'agit du texte principal utilisé lors d'un affichage public de l'élément.

label.name: Introduktion
label.description: Berättande beskrivning, för gruppering. Detta är den primära texten som används när grupperingen visas offentligt.

label.name: Item description
label.description: Narrative description for item in this set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the item in the context of this set.

label.name: Item description
label.description: Narrative description for item in this set. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the item in the context of this set.

label.name: Description de l'objet
label.description: Description narrative pour un élément de cet ensemble. Il s'agit du texte principal utilisé lors d'un affichage public d'un élément dans le contexte de cet ensemble.

label.name: Post beskrivning
label.description: Berättande beskrivning för poster i denna gruppering. Detta är den primära texten som används när poster i grupperingen visas offentligt.

label.name: Presentation type
label.description: Determines how set is rendered when displayed to the public in the Pawtucket/Pawtucket2 front-end.

label.name: Presentation type
label.description: Determines how set is rendered when displayed to the public in the Pawtucket/Pawtucket2 front-end.

label.name: Type de présentation
label.description: Détermine comment l'ensemble est affiché dans le catalogue public Pawtucket/Pawtucket2.

label.name: Presentation typ
label.description: Bestämmer hur gruppering återges när den visas för allmänheten i Pawtucket/Pawtucket2 front-end.

label.name: Is primary item for set?
label.description: The item marked as primary will be used to represent the set as a whole when included in a list of sets.

label.name: Is primary item for set?
label.description: The item marked as primary will be used to represent the set as a whole when included in a list of sets.

label.name: Est l'item principal de l'ensemble ?
label.description: L'item marqué comme principal sera utilisé pour représenter l'ensemble comme un tout dans l'affichage d'une liste d'ensembles.

label.name: Är det primära objektet för gruppering?
label.description: Objekt markerad som primär kommer att användas för att representera grupperingen i sin helhet när det ingår i en lista över grupperingar.

label.name: Chronology element code
label.description: Element code of date range element to be used when placing set items into chronological order.

label.name: Chronology element code
label.description: Element code of date range element to be used when placing set items into chronological order.

label.name: Code de période
label.description: Code d'une plage de dates à utiliser lorsque les items sont affichés en ordre chronologique.

label.name: Kronologi elementkod
label.description: Elementkoden för datumintervall element som användas för att placera in föremål i kronologisk ordning.

label.description: The date when the loan was authorized.

label.description: The method used in the movement of an object.

label.name: Movement method
label.description: The method used in the movement of an object.

label.name: Méthode de mouvement
label.description: La méthode utilisée pour le mouvement d'un objet.

label.name: Förflyttningsmetod
label.description: Den metod som används i förflyttningen av ett objekt.

label.name: Movement note
label.description: Additional information about the movement of an object or group of objects.

label.name: Movement note
label.description: Additional information about the movement of an object or group of objects.

label.name: Note de mouvement
label.description: Informations additionnelles à propos du mouvement de l'objet ou d'un groupe d'objets.

label.name: Förflyttning anteckning
label.description: Ytterligare information om förflyttning av ett objekt eller en grupp av objekt.

label.name: Planned removal date
label.description: The date an object is to be removed from its current location.

label.name: Planned removal date
label.description: The date an object is to be removed from its current location.

label.name: Date de retrait prévu
label.description: La date où l'objet doit être retiré de sa localisation actuelle.

label.name: Planerad borttagningsdatum
label.description: Datumet ett objekt ska tas bort från sin nuvarande plats.

label.name: Planned removal date
label.description: The date an object was actually removed from its current location.

label.name: Planned removal date
label.description: The date an object was actually removed from its current location.

label.name: Plage de retrait prévu
label.description: Les dates auxquelles l'objet a été actuellement retiré de sa localisation actuelle.

label.name: Planerat borttagningsdatum
label.description: Datumet ett föremål faktiskt togs bort från dess nuvarande plats.

label.name: Reason for move
label.description: The purpose or reason for the movement of the object or group of objects.

label.name: Reason for move
label.description: The purpose or reason for the movement of the object or group of objects.

label.name: Raison du mouvement
label.description: Le motif ou la raison du mouvement de l'objet ou du groupe d'objets.

label.name: Orsak till flytt
label.description: Syftet eller skäl för förflyttning av objekt eller en grupp av objekt.

label.description: Berättande beskrivning av turen. Detta är den primära texten som används när turen presenteras.

label.description: Narrative description for tour stop. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the stop.

label.description: Narrative description for tour stop. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the stop.

label.description: Narrative description for tour stop. This is the primary text used when publicly presenting the stop.

label.name: Inledning
label.description: Berättande beskrivning av turen. Detta är den primära texten som används när turen presenteras.

label.description: Location of this stop.

label.name: Notes (internal use only)
label.description: Notes regarding item for internal use only. These notes should not be publicly displayed.

label.name: Alternate identifiers
label.description: List alternate identifiers here. These are alphanumeric codes used at some point to identify the object which are no longer employed.

label.name: Dimensions
label.description: Physical dimensions of object

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.name: Depth
label.description: Depth of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm

label.name: Type
label.description: The type of measurement this is.

label.name: Description of Preservation Event
label.description: Describe the nature of the preservation event, narrativize its purpose, process and outcome.

label.name: UUID
label.description: Universally Unique Identifier

label.name: Asset Location
label.description: relative file path, or other point of reference to a specfic digital object

label.name: Asset Type
label.description: Is the asset being described at the directory or file level? Archive container formats (i.e. zip, tar, etc) are files.

label.name: Asset Provenance
label.description: Where did the asset come from? How was it aquired?

label.name: File Extension
label.description: The file extension for file formats (i.e. .JPEG, .GIF, .PSD, .MOV) or for text files (i.e. .PHP, .HTML, .C, .MD, .R)

label.name: Asset Description
label.description: A brief description of the nature of the asset.

label.name: Description
label.description: A longer, more in-depth description. (about 800 word max)

label.name: Caption
label.description: Short descriptive caption for item.

label.name: Link Type
label.description: There are three link types: Archive URL, Outside Primary Link, and Footnote. Archive URLs are URLs hosted by Rhizome, and we will always ensure their longevity. "Outside Primary Link" reffers to links that are external, and are a link to a web based work itself. We obviously can not control the longevity of these links, but retaining these as a record is important. "Footnote" reffers to external links that are not links to the artwork itself, but rather simply related links and such.

label.name: Link Status
label.description: Use this to record urls that have died.

label.name: Date expired
label.description: If the link has expired, record the date that this was discovered.

label.name: Title
label.description: An optional title for the link. This is mainly useful for footnote URLs.

label.name: URL
label.description: The URL value.

label.name: Credit text
label.description: Text to display as credit line for object.

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting location related to the resource. For individuals this should be used to identify birthplace. For institutions or collectives this should be used to identify their location or headquarters. For geographically distributed collectives, multiple locales may be identified.

label.name: Description
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Curatorial Statement
label.description: Curator's description of the collection.

label.name: Brief Summary
label.description: A very brief tagline / sentence about the collection.

label.name: Description of Partner Collection
label.description: Describe this particular partner collection or batch. In some cases there will be multiple partnership collections for one institution, so if this collection is a batch of a larger project, describe it as such.

label.name: Status
label.description: Record the status of the given collection. "Complete" means that the collection has been recieved and approved by the partner institution

label.name: Copyright text
label.description: Text to display as copyright line for object.

label.name: Languages
label.description: Language used in the resource.

label.name: Editeur de configuration de types de relation
Editeur de configuration de formulaires de recherche

settings.setting: Examples: PHP 5, .JPEG, .MOV, MSQL 4.5, Apple II, Arduino Duemilanove, Macbook Pro (15-inch, Late 2011), Photoshop CS5
Examples: PHP 5, .JPEG, .MOV, MSQL 4.5, Apple II, Arduino Duemilanove, Macbook Pro (15-inch, Late 2011), Photoshop CS5
Here, define what digital asset was the subject of the preservation event.
If the preservation event resulted in a new asset, create a relation to that asset here.

role.name: Administrators
role.description: Confers actions needed by those administering the system

role.name: Cataloguers
role.description: Confers actions needed by those editing catalogue entries

role.name: Researcher
role.description: Allows users to only search and view - but not edit - catalogue entries

role.name: User content moderator
role.description: Allows users to moderate user generated tags and comments

group.name: Cataloguers
group.description: Users who can add and edit catalogue entries
